import { Component, OnInit, Input, Output, EventEmitter, ChangeDetectionStrategy } from '@angular/core'; import { Bodega } from './interfaces/bodegas.interfaces'; import { tap } from 'rxjs/operators'; import { BodegaService } from './services/bodegas.services'; import { MaterialModule } from 'src/app/material.module'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-bodegas', templateUrl: './bodegas.component.html', styleUrls: ['./bodegas.component.css'] }) export class BodegasComponent implements OnInit { bodegas: Bodega[] = []; constructor(private bodegaService: BodegaService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getBodegas(); } getBodegas(): void { this.bodegaService.getBodegas() .subscribe(bodegas => this.bodegas = bodegas); } }
